title: 宠物插件玩家没权限
txt_content: 如题，宠物插件玩家不能捉宠物，只有op可以，怎么办？{:10_492:}

replies.author: Smaoll
replies.txt_content:
给玩家加入以下权限
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.*
    - MyPet.user.command.release
    - MyPet.user.command.respawn
    - MyPet.user.leash.*
    - MyPet.user.keep.*复制代码

replies.author: 黑小白
replies.txt_content: 楼上正解，加权限指令为/mangaddp Builder XX指令

replies.author: fengbokun
replies.txt_content: 好吧  是不是mangaddp Builder   加楼上的指令 就行了
